Title: Masamune Datenicle
Description:
['The coming-of-age battle story will center on the famous 17th-century Japanese warlord Date Masamune when he was young. The Date clan took its name from the Date region of the former Mutsu province, which comprises part of the modern-day city of Date.', '
', '
', '
', '
The anime will be the first in the city's "Kirari na Wonder Project" (Twinkling Wonder Project), which aims to highlight tourist attractions and the appeal of the region.', '
', '
', '
', "
Gainax's newly founded Fukushima studio will work on the anime, and will complete it at the end of March. The anime will have a private screening in April and will also screen in anime events and be posted online.", '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: ANN)']
Characters: ['Date, Masamune', 'Katakura, Kojuurou Kagetsuna', 'Megohime', 'Claude', '4-dai Masayori', 'Date, Shigezane', '12-dai Shigemune', 'Date, Kojirou', 'Monmo', 'Ryuujin']
Voices: ['Murase, Ayumu', 'Kobayashi, Yuusuke', 'Bridcutt, Sarah Emi', 'Hoshi, Souichirou', 'Amatsuki', 'Oosaka, Ryouta', 'Uchida, Yuuma', 'Yamaguchi, Rikako', 'Shindo, Naomi']
Staff: [['Kiyomaru, Satoru', 'Director, Episode Director, Chief Animation Director, Animation Director'], ['Asao, Yoshinori', 'Director, Planning'], ['Nagasaki, Yukio', 'Sound Director'], ['Komiya, Tomohiko', 'Episode Director']]
